name: P Kropotkin
description:
Rereading a portrait of Piotr Kropotkin through digital painting
By glauberbnunes
linktr.ee/glauberbnunes


 "In civilized societies we are rich. How then does one explain so much misery around us? Why this hard labor that brutalizes the masses? Why the lack of security of tomorrow? socialists have said and repeated it every moment with arguments gathered from all the sciences. Because everything cheaply necessary for production: land, mines, machinery, roads, food, shelter, education, science, has been hoarded by a few during the vast history of plunder, exodus, war, ignorance and oppression, which mankind lived before learning to master the forces of nature.
- Piotr Kropotkin
